item.title: 福特供应商获得中国新的稀土简化许可证
item.description: 美国汽车制造商福特汽车公司周三表示，中国稀土磁铁供应商被列入中国政府颁发的首批新出口许可证名单，以增加出货量并减少重要零部件的短缺。【原文：Chinese rare-earth magnet suppliers to U.S. automaker Ford Motor were included in the first batch of new export licences issued by Beijing to boost shipments and reduce shortages of the vital components, the carmaker said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 首席执行官称，感恩节假期一周美国消费者使用美国运通卡的支出增长了 9
item.description: 信用卡巨头美国运通首席执行官斯蒂芬-斯凯里（Stephen Squeri）周三表示，美国运通的网络在感恩节关键假期周的美国零售消费支出录得 9% 的增长。【原文：American Express' network recorded 9% growth in U.S. retail consumer spending around the key Thanksgiving holiday week, the credit card giant's CEO Stephen Squeri said on Wednesday.】

item.title: YouTube TV 将推出基于流派的计划，深化体育流媒体赌注
item.description: YouTube 周三表示，它将于明年初在美国推出新的基于类型的 YouTube TV 订阅计划，这凸显了该平台在美国付费电视市场日益增长的影响力，以及它为锁定体育迷所做的努力。【原文：YouTube said on Wednesday it will roll out new genre-based subscription plans for YouTube TV in the U.S. early next year, underscoring the platform's growing clout in the American pay-TV market and its push to lock in sports fans.】

item.title: 阿联酋数字贷款机构 Wio Bank 押注支付和财富，以推动下一阶段的增长
item.description: 阿联酋维奥银行（Wio Bank）首席执行官贾耶什-帕特尔（Jayesh Patel）周三表示，这家由国家支持的数字银行正在寻求通过支付和财富管理来推动其下一步发展。【原文：UAE's Wio Bank is looking to payments and wealth to drive the next leg of its growth, CEO Jayesh Patel said on Wednesday, as the state-backed digital bank positions itself to capitalize on the country's economic boom.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，贝索斯的蓝色起源公司正在研究轨道数据中心技术
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三援引一位熟悉内情的人士的话报道，杰夫-贝索斯的航空航天公司蓝色起源（Blue Origin）一年多来一直在研究在太空建立人工智能数据中心的必要技术。【原文：Jeff Bezos' aerospace firm Blue Origin has been working for over a year on the necessary technology for artificial intelligence data centers in space, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday, citing a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特姆公司都柏林办事处因中国补贴问题遭欧盟监管机构突袭
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士周三表示，欧盟监管机构上周突袭了特姆位于都柏林的欧洲总部，原因是担心中国可能向这家在线零售商提供国家补贴。【原文：Temu's European headquarters in Dublin were raided by EU regulators last week on concerns about potential Chinese state subsidies granted to the online retailer, a subsidiary of China's ecommerce giant PDD Holdings , a person familiar with the matter said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 尼克-克莱格加入风险投资公司 HIRO Capital，瞄准空间人工智能机遇
item.description: Meta 公司前全球事务总裁、英国副首相尼克-克莱格（Nick Clegg）周三表示，他已加入创始人领导的风险投资公司 HIRO Capital，投资欧洲的空间人工智能创新。【原文：Nick Clegg, the former president of global affairs at Meta and deputy prime minister of Britain, has joined founder-led venture capital firm HIRO Capital to invest in spatial AI innovation in Europe, the firm said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国银行监管机构称大型银行对不受欢迎的行业进行 "去银行化 "处理
item.description: 负责监管大型国有银行的美国银行业监管机构称，美国最大的九家银行过去曾限制向一些有争议的行业提供金融服务，这种做法通常被称为 "去银行化"。【原文：The U.S. banking regulator overseeing large national banks said the nation's nine largest firms had in the past placed restrictions on providing financial services to some controversial industries in a practice commonly described as "debanking."】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，如果谷歌不做出更多让步，将面临因 Google Play 被罚款的处罚
item.description: 直接了解此事的人士说，如果 Alphabet 旗下的谷歌不采取更多措施确保其应用程序商店符合欧盟旨在确保公平访问和竞争的规定，那么明年初它将可能被欧盟处以巨额罚款。【原文：Alphabet's Google is set to be hit with a potentially large EU fine early next year if it does not do more to ensure that its app store complies with EU rules aimed at ensuring fair access and competition, people with direct knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 美国科技公司 UST 与大众奥迪合作，获得 Italdesign 大部分股份
item.description: 大众汽车旗下的奥迪集团周三表示，已与美国技术公司 UST 建立战略合作伙伴关系，后者将收购意大利设计与工程公司 Italdesign 的多数股权。【原文：Volkswagen's Audi Group said on Wednesday it had entered a strategic partnership with U.S.-based technology company UST, which will acquire a majority stake in Italy-based design and engineering unit Italdesign.】

item.title: 美国参议员称 FAA 管理员未能剥离航空公司股份
item.description: 参议院商业委员会的头号民主党人周三表示，联邦航空管理局局长未能剥离他在共和航空公司（Republic Airways）的持股，这违反了他的道德协议。【原文：The top Democrat on the Senate Commerce Committee said on Wednesday that the head of the Federal Aviation Administration failed to divest his holdings in Republic Airways in violation of his ethics agreement.】

item.title: 拉扎德首席执行官称华盛顿战略对完成交易至关重要
item.description: 拉扎德公司首席执行官彼得-奥尔萨格（Peter Orszag）周三表示，交易商现在需要有华盛顿 "白宫或内阁级战略 "才能完成交易。【原文：Lazard CEO Peter Orszag said on Wednesday dealmakers now need to have a Washington "White House or Cabinet-level strategy" to be able to complete transactions.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，辉瑞将在瑞士裁员 200 多人以降低成本
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三援引知情人士的话报道，辉瑞公司将在瑞士裁员 200 多人，作为其多年成本削减计划的一部分。【原文：Pfizer will cut over 200 jobs in Switzerland as part of its multi-year cost reduction program, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 永泰科技邀请 Nexperia 托管人就公司控制权进行会谈
item.description: 总部位于荷兰的芯片制造商 Nexperia 的中国母公司闻泰科技（Wingtech）周三表示，已邀请荷兰公司的法院指定托管人就公司控制权问题进行谈判，这可能是缓和双方关系的第一步。【原文：Wingtech , the Chinese parent company of Netherlands-based chipmaker Nexperia, said on Wednesday it has invited the court-appointed custodians of the Dutch firm for talks on control of the company, a possible first step toward easing relations.】

item.title: Dropbox 首席财务官 Timothy Regan 将卸任
item.description: 文件托管服务提供商 Dropbox 周三表示，其首席财务官蒂姆西-雷根（Timothy Regan）将在任职五年后卸任，并将由税务软件公司 Avalara 的高管罗斯-坦能鲍姆（Ross Tennenbaum）接任。【原文：File hosting service provider Dropbox said on Wednesday its chief financial officer Timothy Regan will step down after five years in the role and will be succeeded by Ross Tennenbaum, a senior executive at tax software company Avalara.】

item.title: 欧盟称，地中海航运、贝莱德竞购和记黄埔巴塞罗那码头可能会推高价格
item.description: 欧盟反垄断监管机构周三警告说，贝莱德和地中海航运竞购长江和记在巴塞罗那港的码头，可能会导致集装箱码头服务价格上涨或质量下降，他们同时展开了全面调查。【原文：BlackRock and MSC's bid for CK Hutchison's terminal at Barcelona port could lead to higher prices or reduce the quality of container terminal services, EU antitrust regulators warned on Wednesday, as they opened a full-scale investigation.】

item.title: 美国允许在1月17日前就卢克石油公司的国外资产进行谈判
item.description: 美国周三将收购俄罗斯卢克石油公司全球资产的谈判期限延长至 1 月 17 日。【原文：The United States on Wednesday extended a deadline for negotiations on buying global assets of Russian oil company Lukoil until Jan. 17.】

item.title: 实时市场：美联储预期降息前，股市涨跌不一，科技股走弱
item.description: 欢迎访问路透社记者为您提供的市场实时报道主页。您可以通过 markets.research@thomsonreuters.com 与我们分享您的想法。【原文：Welcome to the home for real-time coverage of markets brought to you by Reuters reporters. You can share your thoughts with us at markets.research@thomsonreuters.com】

item.title: 据《华盛顿邮报》报道，国土安全部将购买波音 737 飞机用于驱逐出境
item.description: 华盛顿邮报》周三援引两名熟悉合同的官员的话和该报查阅的记录报道称，国土安全部计划斥资近 1.4 亿美元购买一批波音 737 飞机，用于驱逐出境。【原文：The Department of Homeland Security plans to spend close to $140 million to buy a fleet of Boeing 737s to use for deportations, The Washington Post reported on Wednesday, citing two officials familiar with the contract and records it had reviewed.】

item.title: 瑞士称美国降低关税将从 11 月 14 日起追溯适用
item.description: 瑞士政府周三表示，美国将对瑞士的关税从39%下调至15%，这一措施将从11月14日起追溯生效。【原文：The lowering of U.S. tariffs on Switzerland to 15% from 39% will be effective retroactively from November 14, the Swiss government said on Wednesday, delivering relief to businesses that had been saddled with the highest U.S. duties in Europe.】

item.title: 亚马逊将支付 5.1 亿欧元解决意大利税务调查 - 消息人士
item.description: 周三，两位接近此事的消息人士称，亚马逊已与意大利税务征收机构达成协议，支付 5.1 亿欧元（约合 5.82 亿美元）以解决在该国的税务纠纷。【原文：Amazon has agreed with Italy's tax collection agency to pay 510 million euros ($582 million) to settle a tax dispute in the country, two sources close to the matter said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，华为正在权衡法国工厂在艰难的欧洲市场中的前景
item.description: 三位熟悉内情的人士透露，华为正在考虑新近在法国东部建成的工厂的未来，因为欧洲的 5G 推广进展缓慢，而且一些国家的政府对使用中国设备的态度越来越强硬。【原文：Huawei is considering the future of a recently completed plant in eastern France, three people familiar with the matter said, amid the slow roll-out of 5G in Europe and a hardening stance by some governments on using Chinese equipment.】

item.title: BAE 系统公司赢得价值 17 亿美元的美国海军合同
item.description: 英国最大的防务公司 BAE 系统公司周三表示，美国海军已授予该公司一份为期五年、价值高达 17 亿美元的合同，由该公司提供激光制导套件，将无制导火箭转化为精确弹药。【原文：BAE Systems , Britain's biggest defence company, said on Wednesday that the U.S. Navy had awarded it a five-year contract worth up to $1.7 billion to supply laser-guidance kits that turn unguided rockets into precision munitions.】

item.title: 数据显示，10 月份中国外国品牌手机销量增长 13.0
item.description: 路透社根据一家隶属于政府的研究公司周三公布的数据计算得出的结果显示，包括苹果公司 iPhone 在内的外国品牌手机 10 月份在中国的销量同比增长了 13.0%。【原文：Sales of foreign-branded phones, including Apple Inc's iPhone, increased 13.0% year-on-year in China in October, according to Reuters calculations based on data released on Wednesday by a government-affiliated research firm.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司工人宣布周一开始罢工
item.description: 巴西国营石油公司（Petrobras）工会周三发表声明称，该公司工人将于周一举行罢工。【原文：Workers at Brazil's state-run oil company Petrobras will kick off a strike on Monday, their union said in a statement on Wednesday.】

item.title: 新兴市场资产在美联储可能降息前走强；乌克兰成为焦点
item.description: 在市场普遍预期美联储周三将降息之前，新兴市场资产走高，同时投资者也在关注可能影响全球风险情绪的乌克兰事态发展。【原文：Emerging market assets inched higher ahead of a widely expected interest rate cut by the Federal Reserve on Wednesday, while investors also monitored developments in Ukraine that could influence global risk sentiment.】

item.title: Stellantis 超额完成意大利供应商支出目标，产量有望反弹
item.description: Stellantis 公司首席执行官 Antonio Filosa 周三表示，到 2025 年底，Stellantis 公司将从意大利供应商处采购价值超过 70 亿欧元（81 亿美元）的产品，这表明该国的产量明年可能会重新开始增长。【原文：Stellantis is set to end 2025 having made purchases worth over seven billion euros ($8.1 billion) from Italian suppliers, CEO Antonio Filosa said on Wednesday, suggesting output in the country could start growing again next year.】

item.title: 美国第三季度劳动力成本增长放缓
item.description: 由于劳动力市场疲软抑制了工资增长，美国第三季度劳动力成本增幅略低于预期，这对服务业通胀是个好兆头。【原文：U.S. labor costs increased slightly less than expected in the third quarter as a softening labor market curbed wage growth, which bodes well for services inflation.】

item.title: 房贷利率持续走高，美国房价涨幅将保持温和
item.description: 路透社周三对房地产专家进行的一项调查显示，美国房价在今年取得类似表现后，2026年将仅上涨1.4%，这是14年来最缓慢的年涨幅，尽管人们预期还会有几次降息。【原文：U.S. home prices will rise just 1.4% in 2026 after a similar performance this year, a Reuters poll of property experts showed on Wednesday, the slowest annual pace in 14 years despite expectations for several more interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：美国财政部建议在执行反洗钱规则方面发挥更核心的作用
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三报道，美国财政部已提议在反洗钱规则的执行中发挥更核心的作用。【原文：The U.S. Treasury Department has proposed taking a more central role in the enforcement of anti-money-laundering rules, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday.】
